- "Young Guns" (1988) is an American action drama film directed by Brian Helming and starring Patrick Wayne, Brian Keith, and Jack Palance.

- Special Operations Engineer Specialist (SESS) Michael "Mike" Stone IV of the United States Naval Reserve.

- Special Operations Engineer Specialist (SESS) William "Will" Lee IV of the United States Naval Reserve.
